DATA.TEXT: An old lady surrounded by pigeons appears to greet you, gently smiling at you and your small companion.
Rorororo! Hello, dear child. Do you also enjoy the company of pigeons?
Hahaha, yeah, I-I just think they look so funny!
My dad doesn't like it when I play with them, though...
But they're really good at carrying letters! J-Just like us, right?
Rororo, I see... Well, you must be the mailmen I was waiting for!
I'm really glad for your services, you know.
I'd even offer a piece of cake, but sadly, as you can see, I don't have an oven here...

DATA.APPEND_TEXT: Um, lady, do you live here? The address was for this planet, but there's no house in here!

DATA.TEXT: Rororo, indeed, you're a very observant young man!
You see, I'm a writer, and I often spend entire days here... looking for inspiration.
In a way... I see this planet as my second home - the most magical place in the entire galaxy.
But... I don't understand! This planet is so empty and boring... I just see trees and pigeons here.
Ah, but there are many stories to tell with trees and pigeons!
T-There are? None of the stories I like have them...
Mine are just filled with heroes and battles, just like my mom and dad's stories!
Hmmm... Mr. Mailman, do you perchance have something to deliver for me? That might help me with my explanation...
